home.title_2: The DAO for all games on ICP
home.title_4: Only possible on the Internet Computer

mission.title: Our mission
mission.sub_title: BOOM gaming DAO’s three-fold mission is to build the gaming vertical of the Internet Computer blockchain, power the next generation of fully on-chain games, and provide a collaborative hub for all things web3 gaming.

card_1.title: Showcase the Unique Capabilities of Internet Computer for Gaming
card_1.text: We are committed to demonstrating the unique capabilities of the Internet Computer blockchain by pushing its gaming vertical, bringing the technology into the mainstream by exploding its vibrant gaming ecosystem.

card_2.title: Build the Foundational Infrastructure for On-Chain Gaming
card_2.text: We are dedicated to developing the infrastructure that will power the next generation of fully on-chain games on ICP, creating new possibilities for gamers and developers alike.

card_3.title: Foster Collaboration in the ICP Gaming Community
card_3.text: We are creating an all-in-one collaborative hub where anyone involved in ICP gaming can contribute and reap the benefits, whether they're a gamer, builder, developer, guild, investor, partner, or other stakeholder.

tools.title: Open-source tools
tools.sub_title: We embrace the spirit of collaboration and collective growth to foster network effects for game developers across the Internet Computer ecosystem. Everything we build will always be open-source: Game Launcher, World Engine, World Template, Unity Template, Tools, Standards, Examples, and more to come.

launcher.title: Game launcher
launcher.text: Shorten game development timelines from months to days. Deploy WebGL, PC, and Android game canisters, create NFT and Token collections, perform seamless airdrops, manage in-game NFT and Token minting, process payments and staking, configure your World smart contract and more.

world_engine.title: World engine
world_engine.sub_title: Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint. Velit officia consequat duis enim velit mollit.

guilds.title: Game guilds
guilds.text_1: Are you ready to join a thriving community of passionate gamers? Look no further than our guilds section!
guilds.text_2: With a constantly increasing number of members, you'll be part of a vibrant community that's always growing and having fun.
guilds.text_3: And the best part? Joining is just a click away! Simply hit the registration button and become a part of something truly special.
